方法详细信息

swapArchives

public void swapArchives(List<ZoieIndexReader<R>> remove,
                         List<ZoieIndexReader<R>> add)
The readers removed will also be decRef(). But the readers to be added will NOT get incRef(), which means we assume the newly added ones have already been incRef(). remove and add should be disjoint

参数：
remove - the readers to be remove. This has to be disjoint from add.
add -

参数：
zoie -
reader - the IndexReader opened on the index the give zoie had written to.
